Cameron Williams

Hi. I'm Cameron.
I am junior software developer with a passion for all things back-end.

This site serves the purpose of a basic intro of who I am and what I'm in to, as well as providing a place to present my current portfolio and resume.


I am a firm believer in efficiency, as such I will keep the website dialogue to the most minimal possible.
If you have any questions, would just like to get to know me better feel, or just want to chat, free to contact me at any time.

Portfolio

camwilliams.ca

The repository for this website. Actix-web backend(Rust) with a webpack/bootstrap frontend.

Github
Barscreen

A Roku/Connected TV application business idea I worked on with a friend. This repo holds the web-based part of that app, containing the client login/management and a basic API which the Roku apps would call.

Github Live Version
rgdrive

A basic tool I created to start learning Rust. Syncs files/folders between a Google Drive account and a local computer filesystem. Works similar to how dropbox local folders work where you add folders/individual files and file changes are tracked and synced.

Github
